newsitem.title: USA: Everest files for FDA forceps clearance.
newsitem.headline: Everest files for FDA forceps clearance.

text.p: Everest Medical Corp said Thursday it filed for U.S. Food and Drug Administration clearance to market its 3mm BiCOAG Bipolar Forceps for use in female tubal sterilizations.
The company said it believes the device would be the first smaller-diameter forceps approved for use in tubal sterilization in the United States.

"The availability of smaller instrumentation for minimally invasive surgery is expected to expand the number of procedures that can be performed in more economical settings," such as physicians' offices, Everest president and chief executive John Shannon said.
Everest Medical provides bipolar electrosurgery instrumentation for minimally invasive surgery markets.
